meanings.definition: To reduce to particles that are a few microns in size.
meanings.sent1: The machine micronizes the ingredients for better absorption.
meanings.sent2: The company micronizes the minerals to enhance their effectiveness.
meanings.sent3: The chef micronizes the spices to sprinkle evenly over the dish.
meanings.sent4: The artist micronizes the colors to create a vibrant painting.
meanings.sent5: The scientist micronizes the samples to study their properties in detail.

meanings.definition: To make very small or fine.
meanings.sent1: The blender micronizes the fruits into a smoothie.
meanings.sent2: The grinder micronizes the coffee beans for a rich flavor.
meanings.sent3: The tailor micronizes the stitches for a seamless finish.
meanings.sent4: The sculptor micronizes the details on the statue for realism.
meanings.sent5: The jeweler micronizes the gems to set them delicately in jewelry.
